resources.name: my-profile-and-last-signin
resources.title: My profile & last sign-in
resources.description: Basic profile with last sign-in activity for the current user.

resources.name: my-authentication-methods
resources.title: My authentication methods
resources.description: Lists the authentication methods registered for the current user (e.g., Authenticator, FIDO, phone).

resources.name: my-managed-devices
resources.title: My managed devices
resources.description: Intune-managed devices for the current user with OS, version, compliance, and last sync time.

resources.name: my-registered-devices
resources.title: My registered devices
resources.description: Directory-registered devices linked to the current user account.
